thread.title: Hilarious moment trio of 'grannies' twerk and dance outside shops in Oldham
thread.title_full: Hilarious moment trio of 'grannies' twerk and dance outside shops in Oldham

author: Alexandra Rucki
title: Hilarious moment trio of 'grannies' twerk and dance outside shops in Oldham
text:
News Hilarious moment trio of 'grannies' twerk and dance outside shops in Oldham The three dancers began booty-shaking to Flo Rida and T-Pain hit ‘Apple Bottom Jeans’ in Royton Market Square on Tuesday afternoon Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now These grannies have got some serious moves Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
This is the hilarious moment a trio of ‘grannies’ began twerking and grinding in front of shocked shoppers in Oldham . 
The three dancers began booty-shaking to Flo Rida and T-Pain hit ‘Apple Bottom Jeans’ in Royton Market Square on Tuesday afternoon. 
It appeared the nanas were waiting for an appointment at Specsavers when they suddenly burst into dance. 
A video clip filmed by a surprised onlooker shows the troupe dancing energetically, despite their greying hair, long skirts and pediatric shoes. Read More 
The troupe then show off some bhangra moves, before finishing the routine to Psy’s Gangam Style - complete with perfectly in-sync dance moves. 
A giant ear can also be seen busting some moves in the background. 
Passer-by Darren Stubs shared a video of the grannies on Facebook and wrote: “Only in Royton love it. Better dancing than most birds in Royton.” 
Darren, who runs Stubby’s Boxing Centre, said: “I thought ‘what is this in the middle of Royton’. 
“I thought it was quite funny, you don’t often see things like it. There were about 30 people watching. It was really fun. 
“I think it made everyone’s morning.” 
The grannies have proved a hit with more than 30,000 people viewing the clip since it was posted online. Read More Storm Doris: Manchester warned of flood risk, travel chaos and damage to homes 
But it has emerged the ‘grandmothers’ are already a viral sensation, having performed their routine across the UK for several years. 
The grannies are in fact members of theatre company Fizzog Productions, and are actually in their 40s and 50s. 
Fizzog are currently touring the UK with their latest show Suck it and See, but sadly there are no shows planned for Manchester. 
The M.E.N has made tried to contact the troupe. Like us on Facebook
